name: A Bronx Tale
summary_text: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

name: The Dark Tower
summary_text: A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.

name: The Recruit
summary_text: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

name: Joy
summary_text: Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

name: An Education
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

name: Dune
summary_text: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

name: Tombstone
summary_text: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

name: This Is 40
summary_text: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

name: Scream 4
summary_text: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.

name: In the Mood for Love
summary_text: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

name: Last Vegas
summary_text: Four friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

name: Roman Holiday
summary_text: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

name: Kung Fu Hustle
summary_text: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

name: Escape from New York
summary_text: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

name: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
summary_text: The drug war on the U.S.-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. To fight the war, federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with the mercurial Alejandro.

name: Rocky V
summary_text: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.

name: Peter Pan
summary_text: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

name: The Book Thief
summary_text: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being protected by her adoptive parents.

name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
summary_text: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

name: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
summary_text: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

name: Raising Arizona
summary_text: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

name: She's Out of My League
summary_text: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

name: Shallow Hal
summary_text: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.

name: Ponyo
summary_text: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

name: Boyz n the Hood
summary_text: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
summary_text: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

name: Awakenings
summary_text: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: Good Morning, Vietnam
summary_text: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

name: Let's Be Cops
summary_text: Two struggling pals dress as police officers for a costume party and become neighborhood sensations. But when these newly-minted "heroes" get tangled in a real life web of mobsters and dirty detectives, they must put their fake badges on the line.

name: Billy Elliot
summary_text: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

name: Still Alice
summary_text: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

name: The Men Who Stare at Goats
summary_text: A reporter in Iraq might just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the U.S. Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

name: Kiki's Delivery Service
summary_text: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

name: Along Came Polly
summary_text: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

name: Blazing Saddles
summary_text: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

name: Reign of Fire
summary_text: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

name: Vice
summary_text: The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.

name: Miller's Crossing
summary_text: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

name: Freaky Friday
summary_text: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

name: Stuart Little
summary_text: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

name: The Princess and the Frog
summary_text: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
summary_text: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

name: 16 Blocks
summary_text: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

name: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
summary_text: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

name: The Great Wall
summary_text: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

name: Capote
summary_text: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

name: The Break-Up
summary_text: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

name: Syriana
summary_text: A politically charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved in and affected by it.

name: Identity Thief
summary_text: Mild mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

name: The Kids Are All Right
summary_text: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.

name: 10,000 BC
summary_text: In the prehistoric past, D'Leh is a mammoth hunter who bonds with the beautiful Evolet. When warriors on horseback capture Evolet and the tribesmen, D'Leh must embark on an odyssey to save his true love.

name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
summary_text: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

name: Deep Blue Sea
summary_text: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

name: The Lost Boys
summary_text: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

name: Big Trouble in Little China
summary_text: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

name: Rebecca
summary_text: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

name: In the Heart of the Sea
summary_text: A recounting of a New England whaling ship's sinking by a giant whale in 1820, an experience that later inspired the great novel Moby-Dick.

name: Hail, Caesar!
summary_text: A Hollywood fixer in the 1950s works to keep the studio's stars in line.

name: The Monuments Men
summary_text: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.

name: The Hours
summary_text: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

name: Spartacus
summary_text: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

name: Labyrinth
summary_text: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.

name: John Q
summary_text: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

name: The Campaign
summary_text: An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

name: 8MM
summary_text: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

name: Accepted
summary_text: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

name: Man on the Moon
summary_text: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

name: Get Hard
summary_text: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

name: Scream 3
summary_text: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

name: Glory
summary_text: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

name: Savages
summary_text: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: Love, Rosie
summary_text: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldn't possibly be right for one another...or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies.

name: Lady and the Tramp
summary_text: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
summary_text: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

name: Killer Elite
summary_text: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

name: Æon Flux
summary_text: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

name: Hollow Man
summary_text: When the leader of a team of scientists volunteers to be the test subject for their experiment in human invisibility, he slowly unravels and turns against them, with horrific consequences.

name: Matchstick Men
summary_text: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

name: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
summary_text: Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

name: Strangers on a Train
summary_text: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

name: Life as We Know It
summary_text: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

name: Highlander
summary_text: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

name: Escape from Alcatraz
summary_text: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

name: J. Edgar
summary_text: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly fifty years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

name: Rambo III
summary_text: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

name: The Big Sick
summary_text: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

name: Casper
summary_text: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

name: The Thing
summary_text: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

name: Halloween
summary_text: Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

name: About Schmidt
summary_text: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

name: Papillon
summary_text: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

name: Doubt
summary_text: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

name: The Parent Trap
summary_text: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

name: Daybreakers
summary_text: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

name: The Firm
summary_text: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: Max Payne
summary_text: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective and an assassin, who will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

name: The Score
summary_text: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

name: Eragon
summary_text: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

name: Irréversible
summary_text: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.

name: 13 Hours
summary_text: During an attack on a U.S. compound in Libya, a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.

name: Pleasantville
summary_text: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

name: The Bounty Hunter
summary_text: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

name: The Watch
summary_text: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

name: All About Eve
summary_text: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

name: The Shallows
summary_text: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

name: Tremors
summary_text: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

name: Wild
summary_text: A chronicle of one woman's one thousand one hundred mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.

name: Johnny English Reborn
summary_text: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down Chinese Premier Xiang Ping.

name: Bronson
summary_text: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

name: From Russia with Love
summary_text: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.

name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
summary_text: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

name: The Bodyguard
summary_text: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

name: Blended
summary_text: After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attraction grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.

name: Outbreak
summary_text: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

name: The Walk
summary_text: In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.

name: The Nun
summary_text: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

name: Friday the 13th
summary_text: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which was the site of a child's drowning and a grisly double murder years before.

name: Safety Not Guaranteed
summary_text: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

name: Dumbo
summary_text: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

name: Cliffhanger
summary_text: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

name: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
summary_text: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.

name: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
summary_text: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America and this time he reveals more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and the political elections.

name: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
summary_text: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

name: Carnage
summary_text: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.

name: Hairspray
summary_text: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: The Prince of Egypt
summary_text: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

name: Yesterday
summary_text: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate timeline where they never existed.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
summary_text: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

name: Hall Pass
summary_text: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

name: Shanghai Noon
summary_text: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

name: Evolution
summary_text: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

name: Ransom
summary_text: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

name: Happy Death Day
summary_text: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

name: Australia
summary_text: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

name: Stalker
summary_text: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

name: Kubo and the Two Strings
summary_text: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

name: Mulan
summary_text: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father.

name: The Handmaiden
summary_text: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

name: The Strangers
summary_text: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

name: The Time Machine
summary_text: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

name: R.I.P.D.
summary_text: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

name: Margin Call
summary_text: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

name: Star Trek: First Contact
summary_text: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

name: What Lies Beneath
summary_text: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

name: Infernal Affairs
summary_text: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

name: Tag
summary_text: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

name: The Kingdom
summary_text: A team of U.S. government agents are sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

name: Oculus
summary_text: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

name: Flags of Our Fathers
summary_text: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

name: Carol
summary_text: An aspiring photographer develops an intimate relationship with an older woman in 1950s New York.

name: Antichrist
summary_text: A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.

name: Jennifer's Body
summary_text: A newly possessed high school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

name: Nerve
summary_text: A high school senior finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move starts to become manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers."

name: The Predator
summary_text: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.

name: Night of the Living Dead
summary_text: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

name: Contraband
summary_text: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

name: The Mule
summary_text: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

name: Babe
summary_text: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

name: Nymphomaniac: Vol. I
summary_text: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.

name: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
summary_text: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare".

name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
summary_text: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

name: The 13th Warrior
summary_text: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

name: I Origins
summary_text: A molecular biologist and his laboratory partner uncover evidence that may fundamentally change society as we know it.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: The story of the legendary British outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

name: Empire of the Sun
summary_text: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
summary_text: Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
summary_text: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.

name: The 6th Day
summary_text: A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

name: If I Stay
summary_text: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

name: Y Tu Mamá También
summary_text: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

name: Mallrats
summary_text: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

name: The Brothers Grimm
summary_text: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

name: Sex and the City
summary_text: A New York City writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

name: Despicable Me 3
summary_text: Gru meets his long-lost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

name: Lights Out
summary_text: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.

name: Godzilla vs. Kong
summary_text: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.

name: House of Wax
summary_text: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

name: This Is England
summary_text: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

name: Saw V
summary_text: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

name: Police Academy
summary_text: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

name: Priest
summary_text: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

name: The Visit
summary_text: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

name: One Hour Photo
summary_text: A mentally unstable photo developer targets a middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.

name: Parker
summary_text: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

name: Bad Moms
summary_text: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
summary_text: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
summary_text: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

name: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
summary_text: A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.

name: The Kid
summary_text: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

name: T2 Trainspotting
summary_text: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.

name: Ready or Not
summary_text: A bride's wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game.

name: The Raid 2
summary_text: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

name: Twins
summary_text: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

name: Phantom Thread
summary_text: Set in 1950s London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover.

name: Flushed Away
summary_text: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

name: Dirty Grandpa
summary_text: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

name: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
summary_text: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity previously living there, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.

name: Valentine's Day
summary_text: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

name: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
summary_text: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

name: Funny People
summary_text: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.

name: Annabelle: Creation
summary_text: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

name: Ran
summary_text: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
summary_text: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

name: The Meaning of Life
summary_text: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

name: Wild Hogs
summary_text: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.

name: Scary Movie 4
summary_text: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

name: City of Angels
summary_text: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

name: Barton Fink
summary_text: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

name: Let Me In
summary_text: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

name: TRON
summary_text: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

name: The Call
summary_text: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

name: I Saw the Devil
summary_text: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

name: Ghost World
summary_text: With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.

name: They Live
summary_text: They influence our decisions without us knowing it. They numb our senses without us feeling it. They control our lives without us realizing it. They live.

name: Red Eye
summary_text: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in a political assassination.

name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
summary_text: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
summary_text: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

name: Anastasia
summary_text: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

name: Brothers
summary_text: While on tour in Afghanistan, Sam's copter is shot down and he is presumed dead. Back home, it is his screw-up brother who looks after the family. Sam does return, but with a lot of excess baggage.

name: Tears of the Sun
summary_text: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

name: Rang De Basanti
summary_text: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

name: Something's Gotta Give
summary_text: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

name: Pay It Forward
summary_text: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

name: Nebraska
summary_text: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

name: Dil Bechara
summary_text: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

name: Yojimbo
summary_text: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

name: The Giver
summary_text: In a seemingly perfect community, without war, pain, suffering, differences or choice, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the "real" world.

name: Men in Black: International
summary_text: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

name: National Lampoon's Animal House
summary_text: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

name: Any Given Sunday
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

name: From Paris with Love
summary_text: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

name: Mortal Engines
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.

name: Jeepers Creepers
summary_text: A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.

name: The Dreamers
summary_text: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

name: The Crazies
summary_text: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

name: Dawn of the Dead
summary_text: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

name: The Faculty
summary_text: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, she decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

name: Coherence
summary_text: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.

name: Catwoman
summary_text: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

name: The Life of David Gale
summary_text: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
summary_text: Johnny Blaze, tortured by the Ghost Rider's curse, gets a chance of redemption through protecting the Devil's son, whose father is pursuing him.

name: The French Connection
summary_text: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

name: Water for Elephants
summary_text: Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.

name: Charlie Wilson's War
summary_text: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

name: Freddy vs. Jason
summary_text: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.

name: Serpico
summary_text: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

name: Onward
summary_text: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.

name: The Family
summary_text: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the Witness Protection Program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging, as their old habits die hard.

name: Step Up
summary_text: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.
